member.name: T:DynamicCompilation.App_Start.UnityConfig
member.summary: Specifies the Unity configuration for the main container.

member.name: M:DynamicCompilation.App_Start.UnityConfig.GetConfiguredContainer
member.summary: Gets the configured Unity container.

member.name: M:DynamicCompilation.App_Start.UnityConfig.RegisterTypes(Microsoft.Practices.Unity.IUnityContainer)
member.summary: Registers the type mappings with the Unity container.
member.remarks: There is no need to register concrete types such as controllers or API controllers (unless you want to change the defaults), as Unity allows resolving a concrete type even if it was not previously registered.

member.name: T:DynamicCompilation.App_Start.UnityWebActivator
member.summary: Provides the bootstrapping for integrating Unity with ASP.NET MVC.

member.summary: Integrates Unity when the application starts.

member.name: M:DynamicCompilation.App_Start.UnityWebActivator.Shutdown
member.summary: Disposes the Unity container when the application is shut down.
